reason: The statement says 'eigenvalue (1+xi^2)/xi^{3/2}' but more precisely L^dag L has this as its non-zero eigenvalue (on the image of the relevant projector) and eigenvalue 0 on the kernel. This is clear from context (nodes 1.3.1-1.3.2 show the result is proportional to a projector) but could be stated more precisely.
